definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Make sure she knows that periods are nothing to be embarrassed about.
sentences.chinese: 確保她知道大姨媽來的時候沒什麼好尷尬的。

sentences.english: Good. Call me when you get off the rag.
sentences.chinese: 很好，你大姨媽走後打電話給我。

sentences.english: 4 you and your great aunt, let a person see nausea.
sentences.chinese: 你跟你大姨媽一樣，讓人看到就噁心。

sentences.english: Today also happens to be the first day of my period.
sentences.chinese: 今天也TM剛好是我大姨媽來的第一天。
在“大姨媽”日的盟軍護士們。

sentences.english: If menstruation comes, will the safety be far behind?
sentences.chinese: 大姨媽都來了，安全期還會遠麼？

definition: Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to lose one's love/to break up (in a romantic relationship)/to feel jilted
to have a high temperature (from illness)/to have a fever
to blush/to redden (with shame, indignation etc)
